name: Mythic: Frost Trials
description:
In an ancient world divided and ruled by the gods, the Frost Trials have begun. You are invited to slip and slide your way to glory as you navigate the treacherous frost fields to secure the mysterious keystones - all in the name of Science. Will you make a name for yourself in the annals of time or will you fade into obscurity? Will you become Mythic? This is a free spin-off version of Mythic.

MASSIVELY MULTIPLAYER

  • Play solo or with your friends. Enter a massively multiplayer party experience with up to 25 players on your screen at any given time.
  • Competitive Action. Compete against your fellow wanderers to see who can secure the most keystones.

UNLIMITED POWER

  • Slide to victory. Take advantage of unique powerups that appear on the field to push forward.
  • Ever changing. The fields of Frost Trials constantly evolve. Increasingly hostile forces will block your path as you progress. Beware of monsters and players alike!

    The Frost Trials occur within the ancient, labyrinthine world of Mythic.

    What is the difference between “Mythic Frost Trials” and the full version “Mythic”?

    Mythic will have:

  • an infinite, procedurally generated world where each room is a brand-new challenge
  • 5 unique elemental biomes
  • 5 unique elemental bosses to be conquered
  • unique enemies, quests, and puzzles
  • over 70 unique items to equip
  • 4 different crafting systems
  • multiple skill trees to customize your character with
